mainApp.title: Junk News Aggregator
mainApp.header: Junk News Aggregator
mainApp.homeDescription: This site shows English language junk news stories posted on Facebook in the context of the 2018 US miterm elections. The term “junk news” is defined in our methodology. Disclaimer: This aggregator identifies sites based on a grounded typology that was tested in several scientific studies conducted by our research group (COMPROP). It reflects our scientific opinion and evaluation, and does not necessarily reflect the views of our funders or the University of Oxford. The basis of opinion is described in our methodology.
mainApp.archiveDescription: This archive shows English language junk news stories posted on Facebook more than 24 hours ago, in the context of the 2018 US miterm elections. The term “junk news” is defined in our methodology. Disclaimer: This aggregator identifies sites based on a grounded typology that was tested in several scientific studies conducted by our research group (COMPROP). It reflects our scientific opinion and evaluation, and does not necessarily reflect the views of our funders or the University of Oxford. The basis of opinion is described in our methodology.
mainApp.footer: Disclaimer: This aggregator identifies sites based on a grounded typology that was tested in several scientific studies conducted by our research group (COMPROP). It reflects our scientific opinion and evaluation, and does not necessarily reflect the views of our funders or the University of Oxford. The basis of opinion is described in our methodology.

top10MiniApp.title: Junk News Aggregator - Top 10
top10MiniApp.header: Junk News Aggregator - Top 10
top10MiniApp.description: This site shows the top 10 English language junk news stories posted on Facebook in the last 24 hours, in the context of the 2018 US miterm elections. It is updated once a day at 5pm ET. The term “junk news” is defined in our methodology. This is a smaller version of the full Junk News Aggregator, available here. Disclaimer: This aggregator identifies sites based on a grounded typology that was tested in several scientific studies conducted by our research group (COMPROP). It reflects our scientific opinion and evaluation, and does not necessarily reflect the views of our funders or the University of Oxford. The basis of opinion is described in our methodology.
top10MiniApp.footer: Disclaimer: This aggregator identifies sites based on a grounded typology that was tested in several scientific studies conducted by our research group (COMPROP). It reflects our scientific opinion and evaluation, and does not necessarily reflect the views of our funders or the University of Oxford. The basis of opinion is described in our methodology.
